title: The Unblocked Collection
description: My breath just made you quiver. Can you imagine what my tongue would do? A sexy, forbidden, billionaire, workplace romance from USA Today best-selling author Marni Mann …As the ever dutiful daughter at her father’s prestigious real estate firm, Frankie Jordan never mixes business with pleasure.But after meeting her new client, Derek Block, her sexual fantasies have turned into intense cravings.This animalistic man has become the object of her desire.Only she can’t have him.Derek Block is so close to finally getting revenge against the man who tried to destroy him.But after one meeting with Frankie Jordan, his focus is gone.He needs to be inside her, to worship her submissive body until she screams.And then his dick needs to stay the hell away from her… but it has a mind of its own.This is the Unblocked Collection, which includes all five novellas.
author: Marni Mann
